item.title: What Is Neurodiversity?
item.description:
Introduction

  • Definition of neurodiversity: What is neurodiversity? Distinction between neurotypical and neurodivergent.

  • History of the concept: Origin of the term, evolution of the perception of neurological differences.

  • Why this blog? Importance of raising awareness, debunking misconceptions, and promoting inclusion.

What Is Neurodiversity?

Neurodiversity is a concept that highlights the diversity of human brains and minds.

It is not about emphasizing a deficit, but rather about recognizing that we are all different in how our brains function: each person’s neurological system is unique.
